vtkplottensors.cpp File Reference

plot 3x3x3 tensors as ellipsoids More...

Detailed Description

plot 3x3x3 tensors as ellipsoids

vtkplottensors([HANDLE], points, tensors, [labels], [colors], [config, ...])

Parameters:
[in] HANDLE (optional) explicit VTK handle
[in] points Nx3 matrix containing coordinates (see Points)
[in] tensors Nx27 matrix containing the tensors at the points locations
[in] labels (optional) labels for the tensors
[in] colors (optional) color lookup table (see Color Lookup Tables)
[in] config (optional) config structure (see Configuration parameters)
Plots ellipsoids for the tensors at the points coordinates. The ellipsoids are scaled and aligned to the orientation of the eigenvectors and eigenvalues. Additionally they are colored from blue to red (jet colormap) according to the biggest eigenvalue.

If a labels vector is given, the coloring is done according to the labels.

If a colormap is specified, coloring is applied with the labels and the given colors.

Configuration
scaleFactor: (double scalar) factor to be multiplied with the scaling factor generated from the data (to reduce huge outliers)
maxScaleFactor: (double scalar) upper scaling boundary at which scaling is clamped.
phiResolution number of latitude lines
thetaResolution number of longitude lines
